Create a scavenger hunt for your dog to sniff out hidden treats and toys around the house or backyard. This will help improve their sense of smell and obedience.
Use a mirror to teach your dog to "pose" and "stay" in different positions. This will help them develop their coordination and balance.
Incorporate agility training by setting up a mini obstacle course in your backyard using items like tunnels, cones, and jumps. This will help improve their speed, agility, and overall fitness.
Teach your dog to "speak" by using positive reinforcement techniques and treats. This will help them develop their communication skills and express themselves.
Create a "doggy disco" playlist and have a dance party with your dog. This will help them develop their rhythm and coordination, and provide mental stimulation and fun.
